title: Playwright project scaffolding
description: Create the Playwright project structure in tests/e2e/ with package.json, playwright.config.ts, tsconfig.json, and .gitignore. Configure for maximum speed: Chromium-only, parallel workers, JSON + HTML reporters, 30s timeout, retry on CI, screenshot on failure, and --last-failed support.
acceptance_criteria: tests/e2e/ directory exists with package.json, playwright.config.ts, tsconfig.json
package.json includes @playwright/test and typescript as dependencies
playwright.config.ts targets Chromium only for fastest execution
JSON and HTML reporters both enabled
30s default timeout with retry 1 on CI

approach: 3. Configure playwright.config.ts with baseURL http://app:8080 (Docker network)
4. Set projects to Chromium only (fastest single-browser execution)
5. Enable JSON reporter (for Claude parsing) and HTML reporter (for human review)

testing_requirements: npx playwright test can be invoked without errors (even with 0 test files)

context.user_story: As a developer, I want a properly configured Playwright project so I can write fast, reliable browser tests
